price: (57) Every soul will taste death. Then to Us will you be returned.
arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kullu nafsin dhāiqatu al-mawti thumma ilaynā tur'jaʿūna
